snippet: Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy of Spain announced that Crown Prince Felipe would succeed King Juan Carlos.
abstract: King Juan Carlos of Spain says he is abdicating in favor of his son Crown Prince Felipe; explains in address to nation that it is time for new generation to face the country's challenges; abdication follows health problems, but also comes amid decline in his popularity in wake of corruption scandal centered on his son-in-law.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy of Spain announced that Crown Prince Felipe would succeed King Juan Carlos.

headline.seo: King Juan Carlos of Spain to Abdicate Throne for Son
headline.main: A King Makes a Powerful Change, for Stability
headline.print_headline: A King Makes a Powerful Change, for Stability

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Juan Carlos I, King of Spain
